explanation: The overall sentiment on BTC is bullish, with multiple mentions of critical levels being tested, expectations of new highs (targets up to 108500, 109000, 114000, 120000, and even 150000), and strong support from technical indicators such as 4h/daily stochastic RSI moving into bullish zones. While there are isolated calls for shorts, the majority of opinions expect upside movement or recommend holding longs. Technical setups (trendline up, daily chart analysis, moneyflow green, high volume candles) and macro context (tech stocks up aiding BTC) support a buy signal. Many traders are seeking to enter or are already holding profitable long positions, and buy-the-dip mentality is observed at key supports. Leverage discussions suggest up to 20x is considered safe for isolated perpetual futures among participants.
